titles.title: Term Limits bill
A bill for the relief of Randall G. Hain.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S443-444)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full satisfaction of any claim against the United States for any damages incurred by such individual arising out of U.S. Army service.
